flawed_nl_solution:
The third chapter has P + 3 + 3 = P + <<+3+3=6>>6 pages.
The fourth chapter has P + 6 + 3 = P + <<+6+3=9>>9 pages.
The fifth chapter has P + 9 + 3 = P + <<+9+3=12>>12 pages.
The whole book has P + 3 + P + 6 + P + 9 + P + 12 = 5P + 25 = 95 pages.
Thus, without the 25 extra pages from additional chapters, 5P = 95 - 25 = 70 pages.
Therefore, the first chapter had P = 70 / 5 = <<70/5=14>>14 pages.
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 25. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
